ing: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
n: Meghan and Jenn's Veggie, Chicken and Herb Soup
des: "This soup is full of veggies and chicken which is a delightful way to end the day.  Try substituting a can of creamed corn or whole kernel corn for the frozen corn, too."
ins: In a large pot, combine bell pepper, onion, celery (reserve leaves for garnish), broccoli, corn, chicken and garlic.  Season with basil, oregano, rosemary, parsley, salt and pepper.  Stir bouillon into mixture and pour in enough water to cover by 2 inches.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
